title: Immersive VR-Based Instruction for Identifying Computer Hardware Components

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical skills-focused education through VR device integration in a BYOD environment, targeting job competency enhancement for office/administrative professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can identify 15 types of major computer hardware components (motherboard, CPU, RAM, graphics card, storage devices, etc.) in a 3D VR environment with over 90% accuracy
Learners can explain the interconnections between components during actual assembly/disassembly processes through VR simulations
Learners evaluate their satisfaction with the learning content at 4.5/5 points or higher through formative assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
